title: Smart Data models - _3gpp-nr-nrm-externalservinggwfunction schema
description: Defines the YANG mapping of the ExternalServingGWFunction Information Object Class (IOC) that is part of the NR Network Resource Model (NRM).

ExternalServingGWFunction.description: Represents the properties, known by the management function, of a ServingGWFunction managed by another management function.
